Plot: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs, but the queen learns of this and prepares to feed her a poison apple.
Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Writer: Jacob Grimm (fairy tales), Wilhelm Grimm (fairy tales), Ted Sears (story), Richard Creedon (story), Otto Englander (story), Dick Rickard (story), Earl Hurd (story), Merrill De Maris (story), Dorothy Ann Blank (story), Webb Smith (story)
Director: William Cottrell, David Hand, Wilfred Jackson, Larry Morey, Perce Pearce, Ben Sharpsteen
Actors: Roy Atwell, Stuart Buchanan, Adriana Caselotti, Hall Johnson Choir
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 4 nominations.
